main event: A disc-shaped UFO with a reddish glow and the size of a hockey puck was sighted near Denver, Colorado on May 6, 1957. The object moved in a straight path and disappeared behind mountains within 45 seconds of observation.
interesting points: The UFO was described as disc-shaped, with a reddish glow and the size of a hockey puck, providing detailed characteristics of the object.
It traveled in a straight path before disappearing behind mountains, indicating controlled movement.
The report states that the weather and winds aloft conditions were clear at the time and place of sighting, ruling out atmospheric disturbances as the cause.
The observation lasted for 45 seconds, allowing for a relatively long and detailed viewing of the UFO.
The source of the report was a civilian, adding credibility to the sighting.
sighted object: disc-shaped UFO with a reddish glow
